General.Name: Remsons Industries Limited
General.Description: Remsons Industries Limited manufactures and sells automotive components parts and related products in India and internationally. The company offers cables, push pull cables, winches, jack kit, and pedal box assembly, as well as gear shift, parking brake, and combi brake systems. It supplies its products to two, three, four, and commercial wheeler, off roader, and agriculture manufacturers. Remsons Industries Limited was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
